content.rendered: o The purpose of this reporting template is to outline the information that is required to be submitted in the embodied carbon report that is required for ZCB-Design v2 or ZCB-Performance v2 certification. Projects may complete this template or provide a custom report that meets the information needs specified in the document.

excerpt.rendered: o The purpose of this reporting template is to outline the information that…
